snippet: LOMAZOW--Howard, "Lucky Lomazow" on June 22, 2016, peacefully passed at age 90. Beloved husband of the late Pauline. Loving father of Heidi (Dean), Mitchell (Stephanie) and Martin. Cherished grandfather of Joshua, Benjamin, Nicole, Rebecca, Jake and Jesse. Loved by everyone who knew him. He will be loved and remembered forever. 1/3
lead_paragraph: LOMAZOW--Howard, "Lucky Lomazow" on June 22, 2016, peacefully passed at age 90. Beloved husband of the late Pauline. Loving father of Heidi (Dean), Mitchell (Stephanie) and Martin. Cherished grandfather of Joshua, Benjamin, Nicole, Rebecca, Jake and Jesse. Loved by everyone who knew him. He will be loved and remembered forever. 1/3
